p: The collected plant samples were cleaned and shade dried at room temperature. The dried plant samples (20 g) were grounded into coarse powder and macerated twice with 70% ethanol at a ratio of 1 : 7 w/ v at 25°C for 48 h. After maceration, the solvent was evaporated under reduced pressure by using a rotary evaporator (Buchi Rotavapor, Germany).
